C

cabb - Static variable in class FarmersGame
 
checkWinner() - Static method in class FarmersGame
This function checks the status of each boolean to see if the user can keep playing returns 2 if the sheep eats the cabbage returns 3 if the wolf eats the sheep returns 4 if the user has gotten all items across the water returns 0 if the user may proceed to play

D

displayGameStatus() - Static method in class FarmersGame
This method prints out the game board before every move made It changes every time the user moves an item

F

FarmersGame - Class in <Unnamed>
The user has to try and move the Cabbage, Wolf, Sheep, and Human without any items being eaten The wolf eats the sheep if they are left alone The sheep eats the cabbage if left alone Items are booleans that flip between true and false when moved by the user
FarmersGame() - Constructor for class FarmersGame
 

G

game() - Static method in class FarmersGame
This is where the user actually plays the game The user inputs the letter of which they'd like to move each round While loop ends when the game is finished

H

human - Static variable in class FarmersGame
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class FarmersGame
 

S

sheep - Static variable in class FarmersGame
 

W

welcome() - Static method in class FarmersGame
This function prints statements that introduce the user to the game
